sections.title: Why Dealerships Trust duPont Registry Logistics for Vehicle Transport
sections.content: At duPont REGISTRY Logistics, we understand that your vehicle is more than just transportation, it’s an investment, a passion, and a statement.
sections.secContent: Whether you’re relocating, purchasing a luxury car, attending an auto show, or shipping a vehicle to a collector, our premium auto transport service ensures a seamless and stress-free experience.

contentSet.title: Unmatched Expertise
contentSet.content: With decades of experience in the luxury automotive industry, duPont Logistics has a deep understanding of the unique requirements for transporting high-end vehicles.

contentSet.title: Comprehensive Services
contentSet.content: Our tailored transportation solutions encompass a wide range of services, including enclosed transport for added protection, expedited shipping for time-sensitive needs, and door-to-door delivery for ultimate convenience. These services are backed by our unwavering commitment to exceptional customer service and support.

contentSet.title: Trusted Network
contentSet.content: We collaborate only with vetted carriers who share our commitment to excellence, ensuring your vehicle remains in capable hands throughout its journey.

comparison.title: Unveiling The Hidden Costs and Risks of Self-Managed Auto Transport
comparison.secTitle: We are on average 23% cheaper than competitors in the space as confirmed by our client-partners.

contentSet.title: THE DIY WAY
content: Long wait times and stressful negotiations
Unplanned driver delays, cancellations, and inaccurate driver updates
Knowledge of carrier equipment's quality standards
Knowledge about Carrier reputation, USDOT, and fraud history

contentSet.title: THE DUPONT REGISTRY WAY
content: Quick response times with seamless, stress-free negotiations
Guaranteed driver reliability with accurate, real-time updates
Efficient claims processing with a proactive risk management system
Well-defined coverage for peace of mind
In-depth knowledge of carrier equipment to ensure top-tier service
Thorough vetting of carriers, including USDOT verification and fraud history checks
